title: fix: align gemini-search registry with actual model
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Corrected registry metadata for Gemini Search to match the actual model and updated pricing to be significantly lower.
gist.impact: Users will see accurate model information and benefit from reduced pricing rates for search operations.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee updating a price tag on a glowing Gemini crystal. Represents the metadata fix and price reduction.
gist.image_prompt: Pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee adjusting a price tag on a glowing digital crystal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Tiny bee character with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text reading 'UPDATED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee adjusting a price tag on a glowing digital crystal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Tiny bee character with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text reading 'UPDATED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
